name: Happy Place (OlsieBoi)
description:
Deutsche Beschreibung:

Ein Erzählerisch getriebenes Plattformer-Spiel, welches Inspiration von klassischen Märchen nimmt und somit versucht, ein modernen Take des "Märchen" Genre widerzuspiegeln. 

Mit klassischen Jump and Run Mechaniken Springt ihr von Erinnerung zu Erinnerung einer Person, welche zutiefst von Verlust und Kummer geplagt wird. Kannst du Zuflucht in deinen glücklichen Erinnerungen finden?

Kannst du deinen Happy Place finden?

Gemacht für den 2021 Manasoup GameJam.

English Description:

A Narrative Driven Platformer, which is inspired by classic Fairy Tales and aims to shine a new, modern Light on the "Fairy Tale" Genre.

With classic Jump and Run mechanics you jump from Memory to Memory of a person who Is deeply distressed by loss and grief and tries to find ways to cope. Will you find solice in your happy memories?

Can you find your Happy Place?

Made for the 2021 Manasoup GameJam

This is our first Gamejam together! We are happy to have finished the game in time and we learned a lot along the way. We are also looking forward to some honest feedback to better our games in the future!

Thank you for playing!
